desc: Dog training tailored to your individual dog based on your goals. Our focus is to teach you to communicate with your dog in a way that makes sense to them. This helps remove conflict in your relationship to provide a happy, healthy, lasting relationship with your dog.

layout.text:
We are currently Under Construction!
We're so excited for the opportunity to share our new space with you! Board and Train Programs are expected to resume by June 2022
All future private lessons will take place on-site at Canyon State Canine.
